he must suppose that the ancestors were missing a number of crucial pro-
teins that the lucky descendants acquired, proteins that, once present, fit
themselves together in the flagellum. If the intelligent design perspective is
to help settle the unsolved problems of evolution, it would be good to have
an alternative account that tells us how Intelligence facilitated the transition.
